paragraphs: The distance between the original form of the common birds and its roles in our modern society vary.
Making chicken our food goes through the longest way, and the distance between parrot in the wild and its commercialized form might be a little shorter.
Finally, mismatch between sparrow and its role, neighbor, in modern societies might not even exist.
Though the debate on the justice way of living with birds might never end, the truth is the comparison between the situation of these three birds is drastic.

I hope this experience of connecting the dots can both bring and remind us a distinct perspective on our relationship with birds in our modern society, and gradually shaping our lifestyles into a more friendly one to all beings on earth.
